fullText: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd bring a touching chemistry to their portrayal of the unlikely friendship between George and Lennie in this faithful adaptation of Steinbeck's classic.
dtliExcerpt: James Franco and Chris O'Dowd bring a touching chemistry to their portrayal of the unlikely friendship between George and Lennie in this faithful adaptation of Steinbeck's classic.
